revision.text:
Welcome to the
Automatic Semantic Forms sandbox!
Below you can play around with the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. This is easy and works like follows: #Enter an article name in the input field. Use the name of an article that does not yet exist. #Choose one of the categories in the dropdown box. #Hit the 'Try out' button.

|{{#ifeq:{{#isExtensionInstalled:automaticsemanticforms}} |true |Article name: {{#asfforminput:both|40|20|ASF Example||all|  Category:|Try out!|true}}|'''First, you have to install the Automatic Semantic Forms extension.'''}}{{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[:Category:Task in sandbox]]|link=none|source=wiki}}|Category:Task in sandbox|
Hint: Choose the category 'Phone call' as a first example!|}} [[Rationale::This is the sandbox article for the Automatic Semantic Forms extension.| ]][[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]]

{{Content bundle}}
== Information about this bundle ==
[[Rationale::This content bundle contains Property articles, which are used by the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. This content bundle is optional. The Automatic Semantic Forms extension also works without it]]
[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Installation dir::extensions/AutomaticSemanticForms| ]][[Dependency::smwhalo;1.6.0| ]] [[Dependency::semanticforms;2.1.2| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplus; 1.6.0| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplussandbox; 1.1.0| ]] [[Vendor::Ontoprise GmbH| ]]
;Copyright :[[Vendor::ontoprise GmbH]]
;Maintainer :[[Maintainer::ontoprise GmbH]]
;License :[[License::GPL v2]]
;Version :[[Ontology version::1.2.0]]
;How to use :The Properties, which are included in this content bundle can be used to annotate Properties and Categories in order to control automatic Semantic Forms creation.
;Sandbox :We:have created the [[ASF sandbox|sandbox article]] in this Wiki, which demonstartes some Features of the Automatic Semantic Forms extension.
;User manual :More information about the Automatic Semantic Forms extension and how to use it can be found in our [[Help Url::http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Automatic_Semantic_Forms_extension%7CSMWForum%7CSMWForum| ]][http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Automatic_Semantic_Forms_extension%7CSMWForum%7CSMWForum%7C smwforum].
;This bundle contains these articles
{{#ask:[[Part of bundle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |?=Link |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- |source=wiki }}
[[Category:Content bundle|Content_bundle]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Which number should be called in a phone call. (This property is used by the Automatic Semantic Forms sandbox.)]] {{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}} [[Has type::String| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Phone call; | ]] [[Form input help::Enter the phone number
you have to call.| ]] [[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Users may enter several values in a fprm input field for a property in an automatically created Semantic Form. Use the ''delimiter'' annotation to choose the delimiter]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]] [[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::The Automatic Semantic Forms Extension orders form input fields for properties alphabetically. Use the ''Field sequence number'' annotation on property articles to reorder their form input fields.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Number| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]] [[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a property if you want that a help icon with a help message appears next to the form input field of the property in an automatically created Semantic Form.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]] [[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a property article if you want to choose an alternative label for its form input field in an automatically created Semantic Form.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]] [[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::You can use this property to annotate a category.Set the value to 'true' in order to hide the free text input field in automatically created forms for that category.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Boolean| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Category; | ]]
[[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a property if you want that a file upload button appears next to the form input field of the property in an automatically created Semantic Form.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Boolean| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]
[[Category:Property]]

__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a category if you don't want that Semantic Forms are created automatically for instances in this category.]] Please note, that this annotation is not inherited to subcategories. You can also use this property to annotate a property. It then will not be shown in automatically created forms any more.
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Boolean| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Category; | ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]
[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]] [[Category:Property]]

{{Category}} __NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this category == [[Rationale::Use this category for phone calls which you have to do. (This category is used by the Automatic Semantic Forms sandbox.]] [[Use display template::Phone call|:Phone call]]
[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Task in sandbox]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::One can use this property to annotate a category or a property in order to tell the Automatic Semantic Forms Extension to use a specific CSS-class when creating a property's input field, respectively a category's table of input fields.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]] [[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::The Automatic Semantic Forms Extension creates silent annotations, i.e. ammotations that are only displayed in the factbox and not in the rendered article. Use the ''Use display template'' to assign a template to a category so that the data which is entered for that category is displayed via a template.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Category; | ]]
[[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a property article if you want to choose a different input type for that property in automatically created Semantic Forms.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms|:Automaticsemanticforms]]
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property tp provide your own custom page name template for the one-steep-creation processs. The value of this property is inherited from direct super categories if the category does not provide a value itself and if it does not set the value to false.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Category; | ]]
[[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use the ''Validator'' property to annotate a property, if you want to validate a user's input into the property's form input field in an automatically created Semantic form with a regular expression.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Has type::Text| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]
[[Part of bundle::automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

<noinclude>{{Template}}
[[Rationale::This template is used for formating phone call tasks]]
[[Category:Template]]
</noinclude><includeonly>{| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); margin: 0pt 0pt 0.5em 1em; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; position: relative; border-collapse: collapse; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; float: right; clear: right; width: 35%;"
|-
! colspan="2" style="background: rgb(240, 55, 55) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; color: white;" | {{FULLPAGENAME}}
|-
{{Tablerow|Label=Description:|Value=Call the following telephone number.}}
|-
{{Tablesection|Label=Details|Color=#ffb0a6}}
|-
{{Tablerow|Label=Responsible person:|Value={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?Assigned to=|source=wiki}} }}
|-
{{Tablerow|Label=Call:|Value={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?Call=|source=wiki}} }}
|-
{{Tablerow|Label=Start time:|Value={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?Start time=|source=wiki}} }}
|-
{{Tablerow|Label=End time:|Value={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?End time=|source=wiki}} }}
|-
{{Tablerow|Label=Related sandbox project:|Value={{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|?Related to project in sandbox=|source=wiki}} }}
|-
|}</includeonly><noinclude>[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]]
</noinclude>

revision.comment: Created page with "{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a category article if you want to custo..."
revision.text:
{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a category article if you want to customize which standard input fields should be shown in the form footer. If one of the categories of an instance has such an annotation, thae only the chosen default input fields are shown. Otherwise all are shown.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Has type::String| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Category; | ]] [[Allows value::asf message| ]] [[Allows value::summary| ]] [[Allows value::minor edit| ]] [[Allows value::watch| ]] [[Allows value::save| ]] [[Allows value::preview| ]] [[Allows value::changes| ]] [[Allows value::cancel| ]] [[Allows value::save and continue| ]]
[[Category:Property]]

{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a property article if you want to overwrite the default autocompletion constraints that are used for this property in Automatic Semantic Forms. You can use the same constraints, that are also allowed for the constraints parameter for form input fields. This only works if Halo Autocompletion is used.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Has type::String| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]
[[Category:Property]]

revision.comment: Created page with "{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a property article if the property is o..."
revision.text:
{{Property}}__NOTOC__ __NORICHEDITOR__ __NOEDITSECTION__ == Information about this property == [[Rationale::Use this property to annotate a property article if the property is of type text and if you want that the textarea for this property in Automatic Semantic Forms autogrows instead of displaying a scrollbar.]]
{{NoteInText|The characteristics of this property are visible in the factbox below.}}
[[Part of bundle::Automaticsemanticforms| ]]
[[Has type::Boolean| ]] [[Has max cardinality::1| ]] [[Has min cardinality::0| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Property; | ]]
[[Category:Property]]
